name: Super Mario Maker World Engine Level
summary: Learn about .SWE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Super Mario Maker World Engine allows gamers to create, play, and share their own Super Mario levels. The game is available only in Spanish.

To save a level they've created, a player can open the Guardar/Cargar menu and select Guardar Nuevo nivel. After entering a level name and clicking Aceptar, Super Mario Maker World Engine saves the player's level as an SWE file.

instructions: You can open an SWE file in Super Mario Maker World Engine (Windows, Android). To do so:
Open Super Mario Maker World Engine's level creation tool.
Browse to and open your SWE file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .swe file in Super Mario Maker World Engine
images.caption: SWE file open in Super Mario Maker World Engine
